ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Balanced deployment policy for gene-edited crops under explicit biosafety and acceptance constraints.

bullets.item: Phased approvals tied to transparent labeling and traceability.
Targeted agronomic pilots across farm scales before region-wide rollouts.
Standing public feedback and rapid-response communications.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Adopt tiered approval with containment and traceable seed lots.
Pilot yield trials with standardized inputs and audit logs.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Deploy labeling + hotline + outreach to mitigate acceptance risks.
